<code>'''test.mclevel'''</code> is a {{JE}} sample world uploaded by [[Notch]] on [[minecraft.net]] to demonstrate the [[Indev level format]].<ref>{{citation|title=Level File Format|website=minecraft.net|url=https://web.archive.org/web/20100124075449/http://www.minecraft.net/docs/levelformat.jsp}}</ref> It can be loaded in any Indev version starting from [[Java Edition Indev 0.31 20100122-2251|Indev 0.31 20100122-2251]].

== Summary ==
The world is an ordinary normal-sized, square, island Indev world set in the Normal theme. Upon loading the world, the player is located in a grassy field. Some [[grass block]]s in front of the player's starting location were presumably manually removed before the world was saved, as suggested by some patches of [[dirt]] on the ground.

The player's inventory contains:
* 1 {{ItemLink|iron shovel}}
* 1 {{ItemLink|iron pickaxe}}
* 1 {{ItemLink|iron axe}}
* 1 {{ItemLink|flint and steel}}
* 99 {{BlockLink|white wool}}
* 99 {{BlockLink|glass}}
* 99 {{BlockLink|torch|torches}}
* 99 {{BlockLink|TNT}}
* 99 {{BlockLink|bookshelf|bookshelves}}
* 89 {{BlockLink|water spawner|water spawners}}
* 94 {{ItemLink|apple|apples}}

According to the <code>CreatedOn</code> tag in the level data, this world was created on January 21, 2010 at 20:27:07 (UTC).
